TopicTitle: Random Markers Appearing On Rocks (Hit Boxes, but no hit boxes!?)

Articles.Content:
These random markers appear on rocks which is lagging my game A LOT and is a pain to deal with, it makes it impossible to do missions now.
Link to pic: file:///C:/Users/cayle/OneDrive/Pictures/Screenshots/Screenshot_20221027_054746.png
Moved to Gameplay Questions for better visibility.

Markers on rocks? That doesn't sound familiar. Do you have mods installed? 

Also, your picture is not displaying for me.
Have you enabled the surface feature finder from the  Alt-F12 menu ?

7 hours ago, Ravlain said:

Have you enabled the surface feature finder from the  Alt-F12 menu ?

Yes I've tried that, but nothing worked, I tried restarting my PC and my Game.

On 10/27/2022 at 12:53 AM, TheBlueDude said:

These random markers appear on rocks which is lagging my game A LOT and is a pain to deal with, it makes it impossible to do missions now.
Link to pic: file:///C:/Users/cayle/OneDrive/Pictures/Screenshots/Screenshot_20221027_054746.png

My guess is also the surface feature finder. You later wrote you "tried that". Make sure it is turned off.

Your screenshot link isn't good; it points to a local file. Copy it online (with a service like Imgur, Google Drive, etc.) first.

Edited October 28, 2022 by DeadJohn
